Module c195.c195assessment
Package c195.c195assessment.controller

Class ModifyCustomerController

java.lang.Object
c195.c195assessment.controller.ModifyCustomerController
public class ModifyCustomerController extends Object
Controller for the Modify Customer view, allowing users to update details of an existing customer.

  • Constructor Details

    • ModifyCustomerController

      public ModifyCustomerController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller. Sets up choice boxes for countries and first level divisions based on database entries, and sets a listener for the country choice box to filter divisions accordingly.

    • getSelectedCustomer

      public Customer getSelectedCustomer()
      Gets the customer currently selected for modification.
      Returns:
      The Customer object selected for modification.

    • setSelectedCustomer

      public void setSelectedCustomer(Customer selectedCustomer)
      Sets the currently selected customer for modification. This customer's information is used to pre-populate the form fields for editing.
      Parameters:
      selectedCustomer - The Customer object to be modified.

    • getCountries

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Country> getCountries()
      Retrieves the observable list of countries available for selection. This list is used to populate the country choice box in the UI, allowing the user to select a country for the customer.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of Country objects representing all available countries.

    • setCountries

      public void setCountries(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Country> countries)
      Sets the observable list of countries to be available for selection in the country choice box. This method updates the list of countries based on data retrieved from the database.
      Parameters:
      countries - An ObservableList of Country objects.

    • getFirstLevelDivisions

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<FirstLevelDivision> getFirstLevelDivisions()
      Retrieves the observable list of first level divisions associated with the selected country. This list is used to populate the first level division choice box in the UI, allowing the user to select a division for the customer.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of FirstLevelDivision objects representing the divisions associated with the selected country.

    • setFirstLevelDivisions

      public void setFirstLevelDivisions(javafx.collections.ObservableList<FirstLevelDivision> firstLevelDivisions)
      Sets the observable list of first level divisions to be available for selection in the first level division choice box. This method is typically called after selecting a country to update the divisions shown to the user accordingly.
      Parameters:
      firstLevelDivisions - An ObservableList of FirstLevelDivision objects.

    • setupFormWithCustomer

      public void setupFormWithCustomer()
      Populates the form fields with information from the selected customer, including the customer's country and first level division based on their division ID.

    • confirmButtonHandler

      public void confirmButtonHandler(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Validates the modified customer data and, if valid, updates the customer in the database. After successfully updating the customer, switches the scene back to the customer main view. Displays alerts for any validation failures.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event that triggered this method.

    • cancelButtonHandler

      public void cancelButtonHandler(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the action of clicking the Cancel button, discarding any changes and returning to the customer main view.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event that triggered this method.
